ygData.subject: Re: Location of Runes
ygData.msgSnippet: Yeah I was surprised at finding runes on borer beetles as well.  Got a rune of nagafen from one in North Karana as well.  I think it s fairly random. As long
ygData.messageBody:
Yeah I was surprised at finding runes on borer beetles as well. Got a rune
of nagafen from one in North Karana as well. I think it's fairly random.
As long as you are hitting creatures that are above level 12, you'll find
stuff on em. The higher the level, the more likely they are to drop magic
components?

> ----------
> From: Steve Short[SMTP:sshort@...]
> Sent: Friday, May 14, 1999 3:42 PM
> To: EQ_spell_research@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [EQ_spell_research] Location of Runes
>
> From: "Steve Short" <sshort@...>
>
> I found a Rune of Proximity on a Borer Beetle in North Karana. I was
> rather
> shocked that it would be on a creature that isn't very tough(2 level 12
> rangers took him out).
>
